name: San Francisco Department of Public Health
description: The San Francisco Department of Public Health (SF DPH) protects and promotes the health of all San Franciscans. The City's health department is responsible for various health services for the public. SF DPH consists of two divisions: - San Francisco Health Network - oversees the City's clinics, hospitals and programs - Population Health - offers public health services, disease prevention, and infection control
